name.baseName: Funnel and caisson-based gate ; In-situ groundwater remediation ; Funnel-and-gate PRB
漏斗-沉箱式导水门;原位地下水修复;漏斗-导水门式PRB

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 漏斗-沉箱式导水门由隔水漏斗、导水门及活性材料组成，用于潜水埋藏浅的大型地下水污染羽状体。导水门采用沉箱方式安装。

The funnel and caisson-based gate is composed of impermeable funnel, a water gate, and active materials, which is used for large underground water pollution plumes buried in shallow water. The water gate is installed using caisson-based method.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: PRB is assumed to be installed at a simulated site

technology.technologicalApplicability: The funnel and caisson-based gate system described is utilized for in-situ remediation of shallow, large-scale groundwater contamination plumes. This system is specifically designed to intercept and treat contaminated groundwater via a structure consisting of an impermeable funnel and a gate that is fitted with active materials capable of removing contaminants. The gate is installed using a caisson method suitable for control within such environmental restoration projects.
漏斗-沉箱式导水门系统被用于原位修复浸没在浅层的大型地下水污染羽状体。这个系统特别设计用于通过一个由隔水漏斗和一个装有活性材料的导水门来截取和处理受污染的地下水，这些活性材料能够去除污染物。该导水门采用适用于此类环境修复项目的沉箱安装方法。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Mark S. H. Mak and Irene M. C. Lo.Environmental Life Cycle Assessment of Permeable Reactive Barriers: Effects of Construction Methods, Reactive Materials and Groundwater Constituents[J].Environmental Science & Technology 2011, 45, 23, 10148-10154

Mark S. H. Mak and Irene M. C. Lo.Environmental Life Cycle Assessment of Permeable Reactive Barriers: Effects of Construction Methods, Reactive Materials and Groundwater Constituents[J].Environmental Science & Technology 2011, 45, 23, 10148-10154

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying the LCA data for the described in-situ groundwater remediation process, practitioners must ensure that all assumptions used in the process match the intended site characteristics. This includes assessing whether the size and nature of the contamination plume, the water table depth, and site-specific hydrogeological conditions align with those presupposed in the data set. All primary raw materials and energy inputs necessary for the installation and maintenance of the funnel-and-gate system must be comprehensively accounted for in the LCA. Careful consideration should be given to the usage lifespan of the system and how it will affect potential environmental benefits, as well as the inclusion or exclusion of end-of-life recycling.
在应用描述的原位地下水修复过程的LCA数据时，实践者必须确保过程中使用的所有假设与预期场地特征相符。这包括评估污染羽状体的大小和性质、地下水位深度以及特定场地的水文地质条件是否与数据集中预设的条件一致。必须全面核算安装和维护漏斗-导水门系统所需的所有主要原材料和能源输入。应仔细考虑系统的使用寿命以及它将如何影响潜在的环境效益，以及在结束使用阶段是否包括回收利用。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: A 36.6 m length of funnel and four 2.4 m diameter cylindrical gates is installed
